attributes.action: Allow to park free in all UK hospitals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should patients have to pay to park in a hospital car park?? As an out-patient myself I think it's ludicrous that we have to pay to park. As I have to go to the hospital once a week for physio and to pick up my medication and every 4 months for a check up. As a disabled person it's very expensive from £2.00 upto £8.00. I can't believe I have to pay £2 everytime I need a blood test. It's very unacceptable, so therfore I think all UK hospital should have free parking!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
